summary: As part of FY22 appropriations, Members of Congress could request to designate a certain amount of federal funding for specific projects in their communities. While agencies often have discretion over how they award funds, Congress has directed them to distribute these funds to designated recipients. We're tracking the funds to help ensure transparency. The Small Business Administration's FY22 appropriations included $83 million for 128 of...
title: Tracking the Funds: Specific Fiscal Year 2022 Provisions for Small Business Administration
